Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.core.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Main game controller that coordinates game logic and user input. Handles all game events including piece movement, rotation, and game mode-specific logic such as Sprint mode completion and RPG mode progression.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phung Yu Jie

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameViewController c)
      Constructs a GameController with the default Classic game mode.
      Parameters:
      c - The GameViewController to coordinate with for UI updates

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameViewController c, GameMode mode)
      Constructs a GameController with the specified game mode. Initializes the game board, sets up event listeners, and configures mode-specific managers such as RPGModeManager for RPG mode.
      Parameters:
      c - The GameViewController to coordinate with for UI updates
      mode - The game mode to initialize (Classic, Sprint, Ultra, Survival, or RPG)

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentMode

      public GameMode getCurrentMode()
      Gets the current game mode.
      Returns:
      The current GameMode (Classic, Sprint, Ultra, Survival, or RPG)

    • onDownEvent

      public DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the down movement event for the current piece. Moves the piece down one row, handles line clearing, and checks for game mode completion conditions (Sprint mode) or progression (RPG mode).
      Specified by:
      onDownEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing information about the movement source
      Returns:
      DownData containing information about cleared rows and updated view data

    • onLeftEvent

      public ViewData onLeftEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the left movement event for the current piece.
      Specified by:
      onLeftEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing information about the movement source
      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated game view after the move

    • onRightEvent

      public ViewData onRightEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the right movement event for the current piece.
      Specified by:
      onRightEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing information about the movement source
      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated game view after the move

    • onRotateEvent

      public ViewData onRotateEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the rotation event for the current piece. Rotates the piece counter-clockwise (left rotation).
      Specified by:
      onRotateEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing information about the movement source
      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated game view after the rotation

    • onHardDropEvent

      public DownData onHardDropEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the hard drop event, instantly dropping the piece to the bottom. Awards bonus points based on the drop distance and handles line clearing and game mode progression.
      Specified by:
      onHardDropEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing information about the movement source
      Returns:
      DownData containing information about cleared rows and updated view data

    • testLevelUpPopup

      public void testLevelUpPopup()
      Test method to force show level-up popup (for debugging purposes).

    • selectAbility

      public void selectAbility(String abilityType)
      Handles ability selection from the level-up popup. Increments the charge count for the selected ability and assigns it to an available slot.
      Parameters:
      abilityType - The string name of the ability type to select

    • useAbility

      public void useAbility(int slotIndex)
      Uses an ability from the specified slot. Executes the ability effect and decrements its charge count. Removes the ability from slots when charges are depleted.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The slot index (0-4) corresponding to ability slots 1-5

    • onHoldEvent

      public ViewData onHoldEvent()
      Handles the hold event, allowing the player to swap the current piece with the held piece.
      Specified by:
      onHoldEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated game view after holding/swapping the piece

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame()
      Resets the game to start a new game. Clears the board, resets the score, and reinitializes mode-specific managers.
      Specified by:
      createNewGame in interface InputEventListener
